Posts.Content: Has anyone had their surgery at Duke? Any suggestions as to which doctor to choose? Thank you.
Posts.Title: Surgeon at Duke?

Posts.Content: A friend had a test in July when his PSA went from 2 a couple of years ago to 10. He cleaned out his diet and started on a regiment of herbs and this week his PSA results are 6.38. Any ideas as to what this could mean? He is considering to have a biopsy. Can anyone suggest a good doctor in Charlotte NC or Duke University area? Or Atlanta, GA? Thank you
Posts.Title: Decrease in PSA/Doctor referral

Posts.Content: Thanks for the responses. My friend is 59. I would appreciate some names of doctors so everything can be checked out properly.
Posts.Title: Decrease in PSA/Doctor referral
